Class.name: cAdmin.data.Sensors
Class.Description: Class for working with SYS.Monitor.SystemSensors object. Create instance of this class and access the properties - they represent actual values at the time of accessing.

Property.name: LockTable
Property.Description: Percentage of the lock table in use

Property.name: CSPGatewayLatency
Property.Description: Time (milliseconds) required to obtain a response from the listed CSP gateway server when fetching the metrics represented by the CSP sensor objects.

Property.name: SMH
Property.Description: Percentage of the shared memory heap in use

Property.name: JournalSpace
Property.Description: Free disk space, availible for journals

Property.name: FreeJournalSpacePercent
Property.Description: Free disk space, in percent to journal size

Property.name: LicenseInvalidReason
Property.Description: Reason the key is invalid or in a troubled state

Method.name: DBStats
Method.Description: Get information about databases in JSON format

Method.Description: Create and Initialyse System Sensors after object creation
